p.d: Angele discovers a worrying detail: she and Ana were both born in the same year and on same day. The autopsy reveals that Ana had had consensual sexual relations before her death. Another patient in the clinic is pregnant but has absolutely no memory of having had sex. Coincidence? Directed by: Vincent Lannoo (France, 2018) Screenplay: Jeanne Le Guillou, Bruno Dega Cast: Noémie Schmidt (Angele Maury), Béatrice Dalle (Élisabeth Favard), Hippolyte Girardot (Raphaël Santi), Judith El Zein (Alexandra Santi), Samuel Theis (Simon), Grégoire Leprince-Ringuet (Maxime), Mylene Demongeot (Rose), Achille Ridolfi (Louis), Émilie Dequenne (Camille), Scali Delpeyrat (Guillaume), Florence Thomassin (Valérie), Antoine Gouy (Bastien), Jérémy Gillet (Arnaud), Yaël Abecassis (Iris Galmont) Genre: detective Awards: Pyrénées d'Or prize for the best mini-series, audience prize for the best mini-series, 2019 Luchon Festival for Television Creation.
